ingredients.ingredient: ½ (12 fluid ounce) can evaporated milk

cookingTips: Blend all ingredients until smooth before freezing for best texture
Freeze for about 1-2 hours, then stir with a fork to break up ice crystals every 30 minutes
This Puerto Rican frozen treat is best served immediately after final stirring for a shaved ice consistency
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Limber de coco is a Caribbean frozen treat. Do you have an ice cream maker, or would you prefer the hand-stirred method?
